fakeJob.descriptions:
• Melakukan proses penerimaan karyawan dari proses Screening sampai Recruiting
  • Memperbaharui dan memelihara database, catatan, dan laporan SDM dengan data karyawan yang akurat
  • Mempersiapkan kontrak kerja untuk karyawan baru perusahaan
  • Melakukan penyusunan absensi atau daftar hadit karyawan perusahaan
  • Memperisapkan berbagai macam internal letter dan outgoing letter
  • Mempersiapkan segala kebutuhan karyawan
  • Melakukan sosialisasi dan koordinasi terhadap seluruh karyawan

If you desire to be part of something special, to be part of a winning team, to be part of a fun team - winning is fun. We are looking forward to Project Manager in CIMB Niaga, based in Jakarta, Indonesia. In CIMB Niaga, making our work exciting, engaging, meaningful; ensuring safety, health, wellness; and being a model of inclusion & diversity are already embedded in who we are - it’s in our values, part of our vision, and our clearly defined aspirational goals. The primary function of the job is managing all the project implementation and services within the country

Kewajiban:
Teller: Menerima setoran tunai, deposito, rekening giro, kiriman uang/ transfer, dan tagihan umum.
Customer Service: melayani pembukaan rekening koran tabungan dan deposito, menerima dan membuat permintaan buku cek dan giro serta mengaktifkan resinya, menangani dan mengelola keluhan customer.

• Membuat dan mengurus laporan kedisiplinan karyawan
  • Mengurus surat-surat Legalitas Perusahaan
  • Mengurus semua perijinan dan persyaratan yang berkaitan dengan DISNAKER, BPJS dan lembaga terkait lainnya
  • Mengurus segala perijinan asset/inventaris Perusahaan
  • Mempersiapkan dan mereview kontrak kerja sama dengan Karyawan
  • Mengerjakan dan mengelola administrasi HR, Payroll & mendukung kerja GA

A 2D artist will be involved in the visual development aspect of a video game. From the character, settings, interface display, and visual effects. To establish a career as a 2D artist, you will be required to master the basics of 2D painting like the usage of shapes and colors, compositions, anatomy, etc. You need to understand the various methods in making a game asset like animation, visual interface, and visual effects. An experienced 2D artist can develop a career that specialized in game art such as concept artist, environment artist, character designer, art director, etc.
